thread.title: Ground News - Late rally fails to save Tottenham in 4-2 loss at Brighton
thread.title_full: Ground News - Late rally fails to save Tottenham in 4-2 loss at Brighton

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Late rally fails to save Tottenham in 4-2 loss at Brighton
text:
Summary by Ground News Tottenham Hotspur lose 4-2 at Brighton & Hove Albion in the Premier League . Victory would have put injury-hit Spurs above Manchester City into fourth spot. Brighton move into eighth place in the table on 30 points while Tottenham remain fifth on 36. Brighton, without the likes of Kaoru Mitoma, Tariq Lamptey, Solly March and Julio Enciso, snapped three-match winless sequence. Share menu More
